summary: In future Moscow, where corporate brands have created a disillusioned population, one man's effort to unlock the truth behind the conspiracy will lead to an epic battle with hidden forces that control the world.
cast: Ed Stoppard|Leelee Sobieski|Jeffrey Tambor|Max von Sydow|Mariya Ignatova|Roman Petrenko|Anastasiya Nefedova|Nick Harvey|John Laskowski|Douglas A.
